issue.title: CPP README Brewfile link incorrect
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-1910](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-1910). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
The cpp README states
```Java

brew bundle --file=cpp/Brewfile
```
There is no such file.
Files do exist for the following
```Java

./c_glib/Brewfile
./python/Brewfile
```
I assume that this should point to the c_glib directory instead
